Description:
Detects the creation of files created by mimikatz such as ".kirbi", "mimilsa.log", etc.

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), David ANDRE
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - Mimikatz Kirbi File Creation
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (filepath like '%.kirbi' or filepath like '%mimilsa.log')
